name: JS Game Server
body:
The proposal game server for the [js13kGames Competition](http://js13kgames.com) Competition.

This project is a important piece of the proposal [posted on a html5gamedevs forum topic](http://www.html5gamedevs.com/topic/7866-rules-proposal-for-js13kgames-server-category/). An effort maintain the server category on the competition.

***

You can help! Test it.

## Deploy
```sh
$ git clone git://github.com/aurium/js-game-server.git
$ cd js-game-server
$ npm install
$ npm test
```

## Runing

You must to set the `GAMES_DIR` environment variable to the server.

On BASH-like consoles you have a pretty simple one-line command:
```sh
$ cd /path/to/js-game-server
$ GAMES_DIR=/the/dir/with/games npm start
```

Try it with the game examples:
```sh
$ GAMES_DIR=examples npm start
```

## Contributing

Clone, code, push and request a merge.

**Wee need automated tests!**
